availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Matilda Falkner Murray in Grant County on August 17, 1848. Father of William H. Murray, Mary J. Murray, Nicholas Murray, James B. Murray, Polly A. Murray. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860. Employed America Falkner in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, p. 159.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #001490815, p. 501 of 742 on Microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
